SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.content, a.view_count, a.created_at, a.updated_at, a.pinned_yn, c.name AS categoryName, c.category_id, ad.name AS adminName FROM article a INNER JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.category_id INNER JOIN admin ad ON a.admin_id = ad.admin_id WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article ( category_id, admin_id, title, content, pinned_yn) VALUES (${category.categoryId}, ${admin.adminId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pinnedYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET category_id = ${category.categoryId}, admin_id = ${admin.adminId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, pinned_yn = #{pinnedYn} WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
